scripts.build: npm run build:minifyJs && npm run build:minifyCss && npm run copy
scripts.debug:run: npm run debug:copy_all && npm run debug:rename_all && npx http-server ./debug_dist
scripts.debug:copy_all: npx copyfiles index.html favicon.ico src/styles.css src/script.js debug_dist/
scripts.debug:rename_all: mv debug_dist/src/styles.css debug_dist/styles.dist.css && mv debug_dist/src/script.js debug_dist/script.dist.js
scripts.clean: npx del-cli ./dist ./debug_dist ./node_modules && mkdir dist && touch ./dist/.gitkeep && mkdir debug_dist && touch ./debug_dist/.gitkeep
